text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Summer rolls around, and we arrive at<n>the academy's
seaside facilities to<n>begin our summer training session.<n>
Right before we start, however...

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
Do you have a moment before we<n>start training? I wanted
to give you<n>something.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Oguri Cap rummages through her bag<n>and pulls out a sheet
of paper. It looks<n>to be some kind of handwritten<n>
questionnaire.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
Could you fill this out while I'm<n>warming up? It shouldn't
take long.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: I quickly glance over the questions.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
"Do you like sweet food?" "Do you<n>like spicy food?" "Do
you have any<n>food allergies?" ...All the questions<n>seem to
be about food.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
They're mostly yes-no questions, so<n>you shouldn't have to
think too hard<n>about your answers.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: You'll do it, right?

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: Thanks. I'll leave you to it then.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I fill out the questionnaire while Oguri<n>Cap runs her warm-up
laps.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
Thanks. I'll check your answers later<n>tonight and see if
there's anything to<n>be avoided.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
Yep, don't worry about it. You filled<n>everything out, so I
should have a<n>pretty good grasp.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
Let's focus on training for now. I<n>need to be sure I'm
prepped for<n>tonight.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
Work hard, play hard. I'll push<n>through today's training and
make<n>sure I expend as much energy as<n>possible.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: Don't you know? Tonight is... Hmmm,<n>wait a sec.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: It's better I keep this a secret, right?

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
Hmm, certainly a dilemma. Well, I'll<n>think about it a bit more
after we finish<n>training.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Something appears to be on Oguri<n>Cap's mind, but I decide
to drop the<n>subject for now and focus on her<n>training.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant... Phew.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
Is that the last of our regimen? I feel<n>like I can do a bit
more...

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: I guess you're right. I don't want topush myself too hard today.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: I still have to go over your answers<n>and get ready for later.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
I took a peek at the paper earlier, but<n>I've never done this
before, so it's<n>better to play it safe and have extra<n>time...

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, there's a place I'd like to take<n>you. Let's wash up
and meet in front<n>of the training hall.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: No. No eating.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
Don't get me wrong. I just finished<n>training. I'm starving.
But as much as<n>I'd like to eat, we can't. Not yet, at<n>least.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
The training hall is especially fragrant<n>around this time.
Dinner today is fried<n>chicken and boiled vegetables, so I<n>
expect the halls to be especially<n>aromatic.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: But we must overcome thistemptation. There's something weneed to do. And if that meansskipping a meal or two, then so be it.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: So... Please, no eating.
choice_data_list: A-all right, if you say so...

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: Thank you.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
...I think I'll make a quick stop by the<n>cafeteria and ask if
they can save me<n>some food for later though.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: In any case, I'll see you soon.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Oguri Cap hurries away. Later that<n>evening...

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: We're finally here.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: Look at all these food stalls. Amazing,<n>isn't it?

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: Yep. I just had to have dinnerhere.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
As you can see, there are so many<n>food options available to
us. I'm sure<n>you'll find something you like.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
Eat as much as you like—my treat. I<n>wanted to thank you for
everything<n>you've done for me.
choice_data_list: Is this what the questionnaire was about?

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
Yeah. I realized that you know way<n>more about me than I do
about you.<n>It's only fair that I at least find out<n>what your
culinary likes and dislikes<n>are.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
In any case, you do so much to<n>support me. I just wanted
to return<n>the favor in my own way. So dinner's<n>on me.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Oguri Cap must've put a lot of timeand effort into coming up with thisplan... She's usually more occupiedwith the eating part...

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
Besides... whenever I'm with you,<n>everything tastes great
no matter<n>what I'm eating. So I wanted to come<n>here
together...
choice_data_list: Always a pleasure to share a meal with you!

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: Great. If you're happy, I'm happy.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
All right, then. Shall we begin? We'll<n>start with all the
jumbo-sized foods.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: Everything here is so big. "Jumbo"<n>doesn't even cover it.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
There's enough shaved ice to fill a<n>bucket, and the
okonomiyaki's big<n>enough to serve as cushions. And the<n>
takoyaki? They're the size of<n>baseballs.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
You say that, but shaved ice is mostly<n>water. And look at the
okonomiyaki.<n>It's all cabbage.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
You couldn't call any of this a meal.<n>This is more like... an
appetizer.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
Heh, I'm glad you're as excited as I<n>am. I feel ya. I can't
wait to start<n>eating.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
Excuse me, mister! Can I get two<n>servings of shaved ice
and four<n>okonomiyaki?

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
Uh-huh. I want to try out the other<n>stalls too, so we're
starting off light. If<n>you want more, we can come back<n>
later.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
No need to hold back. Feel free to eat<n>to your heart's
content.
choice_data_list: There's no way I can eat all of thi—

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
Whenever I need anything, you're<n>always the first person
to provide it.<n>This is my way of saying thank you.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
I've never done anything like this<n>before, so it's kind of
embarrassing...<n>but please accept my gratitude.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Oguri Cap's words of gratitude were<n>moving... But not
moving enough to<n>dislodge me from my seat after<n>stuffing
myself immobile.
